summary: This mod add a follower called Ivy in to your SKYRIM
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]NOTICE[/size][size=5]:[/size]
[size=3]    This mod needs the downguard dlc 
[/size]
[size=5][u]Description[/u][/size]
[size=3]   this mod add a stand-alone simple follower Ivy in to your SKYRIM,[/size][font=Trebuchet MS][size=6]She's in the Drinking Huntsman,Whiterun City
[/size][/font]
[size=5][u]basic info[/u][/size]
[size=3]name:Ivy[/size]
occupation:huntsman
body type:stand-alone 7b min weight body(high resolution textures)
[size=3]level:the same to your char[/size]
[size=6]location: [b]the Drinking Huntsman[/b][/size][size=3]
[/size]

[u][size=5]Customized build:[/size][/u][size=3]
- Morality: Any crime
- Race: nord race
- Starting gear: Her inventory didn't contains any weapon,you just give her some
- Battle style: she's good at shooting the knees

[/size]
[size=5][u]Installation[/u]:[/size]
[size=4]    Just use NMM to install it or simply extract files to skyrim/data[/size]
[u]
[/u]





[b][u][size=4]Used Resources[/size][/u][/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures Renewal by Hello Santa

Fair Skin Complexion by [b]HHaleyy[/b][/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?]Enhanced Character Edit by ECE team

KS hairdos by Kalilies Shocky and Stealthic Khaos

UNP Jewelry Variants by Aurielius
[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53442/?]zzjay's wardrobe by [b]zzjay[/b][/url] 


[b][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55914/?]CR Enb by Bigeyescarl [/url]used for screenshots,highly commended[/size][/b]


[u]
[/u]
author: ilikeawp
